details:
noun
- a distinguishing difference
= example: a distinguishing difference
- a distinguishing quality
= example: a distinguishing quality
= synonyms: characteristic
- a discrimination between things as different and distinct
= example: a discrimination between things as different and distinct
= synonyms: differentiation
- high status importance owing to marked superiority
= example: high status importance owing to marked superiority
= synonyms: note, eminence, preeminence
